content: enjoy this wonderful crochet headband that s a joy to make and to wear thanks to a super-indulgent yarn pattern uses single_crochet in the back loop only single_crochet blo to form a stretchy softly textured headband using red heart hygge yarn after crocheting a rectangle clever folding and a quick seam are all it takes to create the twisted design that is the faux knot use any 2 shades of hygge for a cool colorblock effect it s a quick and easy project so create one for all the ladies on your list
